text: Sun Pictures is an Indian film distribution and production studio based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. It is a division of the Sun TV Network, a part of the Sun Group. The company has produced over 25 movies in Tamil language. In 2010, it started producing films, the first film was Enthiran which was made over . Alongside Enthiran, the company have produced numerous films such as Beast and Sarkar starring Vijay alongside Petta and Jailer. ==Leadership== Chairman, Founder, Owner and C.E.O: Kalanithi Maran C.O.O: Sembian Sivakumar ==Films produced == * All films are in Tamil, unless mentioned otherwise.
